page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: IN{LUTHRIE }THERE IS A MIXTURE OF {PRIVATELY OWNED}AND{RENTED {ACCOMMODATION.}THE LATTER IS PARTLY{COUNCIL OWNED,}AND PARTLY {PRIVATELY RENTED. HOUSES}RANGE FROM {LARGE DETACHED MANOR HOUSES}THROUGH {SEMI_DETACHED}AND{TERRACED MODERN {HOUSES}TO{TWO BED ROOMED COTTAGES. MATERIALS USED ARE{STONE,HARLED_BRICK AND{WOOD; ROOFS}ARE MADE OF{SLATE}OR {RED TILES.}SOME{HOUSES}HAVE{FLAT_ {ROOFED EXTENSIONS.}THE {SCHOOL HOUSE } IS NO LONGER USED BY THE{HEADTEACHER,} AND HAS BEEN SOLD.IN{MOONZIE}THERE IS NO{COUNCIL OWNED PROPERTY.}SOME COMPARATIVELY NEW{BUNGALOWS}HAVE BEEN BUILT.THERE ARE A NUMBER OF{DISUSED {FARM COTTAGES.}THE{SCHOOL HOUSE}IS STILL INHABITED ALTHOUGH THE{SCHOOL}IS NO LONGER IN USE.
